title: Problem-Based Information Security Education for Cultivating Cybersecurity Experts

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Simulation tools and collaborative learning techniques for practice-oriented courses optimized for post-COVID online environments

learning_goals: Analyze real-world cyberattack scenarios to establish appropriate defense strategies.
Evaluate system security by applying encryption technologies and access control mechanisms.
Propose security solutions applying ethical judgment criteria during team-based problem-solving processes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
